page.title: 18Social Concern in Ringmer
page.content: People of Ringmer help each other: {Ringmer Link Scheme:}practical help for those in need. {Neighbourhood Watch:}crime prevention. {Babysitting Circle:}looking after one another's children in the evening. {Phab Club:}meeting of physically handicapped and able-bodied. {Evergreen Club:}social club for senior citizens - tea dances, exercises. Villagers look beyond Britain: {Peace Campaign:}working for world-wide peace. {Caring and Sharing:}a church group fundraising for the Third World. {Ethiopian Appeal:}Â£7000 raised in 10 months. Used to dig a well, set up and equip a feeding centre and will also fund the return of some families to their area equiped with seed,tools and food, following the break in the drought.
